metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40032 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: libvips is a demand-driven, horizontally threaded image processing library. A specially crafted SVG input can cause libvips versions 8.14.3 or earlier to segfault when attempting to parse a malformed UTF-8 character. Users should upgrade to libvips version 8.14.4 (or later) when processing untrusted input.

criterions.comment: vips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
